name: author-speak-before
value: Welcome to our first lesson on Model Context Protocol! In this short tutorial, we'll build the tiniest possible MCP server using FastMCP in Python, and test it with mcp-cli. By the end of this lesson, you'll see a complete round-trip from MCP server creation to JSON response.

name: author-speak-before
value: First, we need to create our hello_mcp.py file. This will contain our minimal MCP server implementation.

name: author-speak-before
value: Now let's write our MCP server code. We'll start by importing the FastMCP library.
